comment.author: 91351899@N00
comment._content:
In 2007 prior to the 2nd Tacoma Narrows Bridge being officially opened to motor vehicles, they held a run finishing and ending on the bridge with all the participants receiving a 'I Ran the Span' T-shirt.  Somebody came up with this clever T-shirt for the original I Ran the Span...
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/suspensionstayed/4228320351/in/photostream]
